column5: Where is Black Bay on Lac Seul? I thought it was the very NE end of Aldous Bay. Lac Seul Lodge has an outpost cabin somewhere in Black Bay, but I don't know where. I've seen a cabin on the north side of Aldous that is an area that could be called a bay though did not motor up to it a few years ago. This cabin was closer to the main lake area. Could have been a locals cabin? Just curious as I've fished that area several times and not noticed an outpost type of cabin. Pooch
I believe I have dropped the red dot on the maps where the Outpost Cabin is located.
Thanks John. LSL's outpost isn't as far east as I thought. Pooch
